page.title: 14BUCKLEBURY CHAPEL ROW.
page.content: There is a small executive housing estate where most of the people work from their own homes. Opposite Carbins Wood is a small counil estate, mostly bungalows.The rest of the houses are scattered.The Avenue across the common woodland is of oak trees.It is said the Avenue is haunted by a coach and horses who trying to by-pass the closed road gate drove into a pond. The Bladebone got its name from a mammoth shoulder bone found when digging the foundations.There is a small general and Post Office and a sheltered housing unit for old people. The doctors surgery is part of a practice that caters for 6,000 people. There are three doctors, a health visitor and three nurses.
